TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProjectRootElement extends Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectElementContainer

summary.span: 表示 MSBuild 專案、目標檔案，或任何符合 MSBuild 專案檔案結構描述的其他檔案。

span.span: Represents an MSBuild project, a targets file, or any other file that conforms to MSBuild project file schema.

summary.span: 這個類別與其相關類別都允許讀取和寫入完整的 MSBuild 專案或目標檔案。

span.span: This class and its related classes allow a complete MSBuild project or targets file to be read and written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註解和空格無法透過此模型的編輯。Comments and white space cannot be edited through this model at present. 每個專案根項目都與只有一個專案集合。Each project root element is associated with exactly one project collection. 這可讓該專案集合的擁有者，來控制其存留期，並不而感到驚訝來自另一個專案集合的編輯。This allows the owner of that project collection to control its lifetime and not be surprised by edits that come from another project collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectImportElement AddImport(string project) cil managed
Public Function AddImport (project As String) As ProjectImportElement

span.span: The project to be imported.

summary.span: 將專案匯入加入至這個專案。

span.span: Adds a project import to this project.

returns.span: 傳回已加入的專案匯入。

span.span: Returns the added project import.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果匯入群組存在，將專案匯入插入的最後一個匯入群組沒有條件的屬性。在專案結尾處，否則會建立匯入。If import groups exist, inserts the project import into the last import group that has no Condition attribute; otherwise, creates an import at the end of the project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectImportGroupElement AddImportGroup() cil managed

summary.span: 在此專案結尾建立匯入群組。

span.span: Creates an import group at the end of this project.

returns.span: 傳回在此專案結尾建立的匯入群組。

span.span: Returns the import group created at the end of this project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此項便利的方法會挑選啟發學習法為基礎的 MSBuild DOM 中的位置。This convenience method picks a location in the MSBuild DOM based on a heuristic.

summary.span: 將項目加入至這個專案。

span.span: Adds an item to this project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemElement AddItem(string itemType, string include) cil managed
Public Function AddItem (itemType As String, include As String) As ProjectItemElement

param.name: itemType
param.span: 要加入之項目的項目型別。

span.span: The item type of the item to be added.

param.name: include
param.span: 要加入之項目的 Include 值。

span.span: The Include value of the item to be added.

summary.span: 將項目加入至這個專案。

span.span: Adds an item to this project.
Returns the added item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立項目，然後加入沒有條件屬性的項目群組，和至少一個項目相同的項目類型。Creates an item, then adds it to an item group with no Condition attribute and at least one item of same item type. 如果找到這類的項目群組，就會建立新的項目群組和新增項目。If no such item group is found, creates a new item group and adds the item to it. 包含值會依據排序項目。Items are ordered by Include values. 如果項目符合現有的萬用字元運算式，這個項目類型，則沒有任何作用。Does nothing if the item matches an existing wildcard expression for this item type.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemElement AddItem (string itemType, string include, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<string,string>> metadata);

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemElement AddItem(string itemType, string include, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<string, string>> metadata) cil managed
Public Function AddItem (itemType As String, include As String, metadata As IEnumerable(Of KeyValuePair(Of String, String))) As ProjectItemElement

param.name: itemType
param.span: 要加入之項目的項目型別。

span.span: The item type of the item to be added.

param.name: include
param.span: 要加入之項目的 Include 值。

span.span: The Include value of the item to be added.
The metadata to be added.

summary.span: 將含中繼資料的項目加入至這個專案。

span.span: Adds an item with metadata to this project.
Returns the added item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立項目，然後加入沒有條件屬性的項目群組，和至少一個項目相同的項目類型。Creates an item, then adds it to an item group with no Condition attribute and at least one item of same item type. 如果找到這類的項目群組，就會建立新的項目群組和新增項目。If no such item group is found, creates a new item group and adds the item to it. 包含值會依據排序項目。Items are ordered by Include values.

Public Function AddItemDefinition (itemType As String) As ProjectItemDefinitionElement

param.name: itemType

span.span: The item type of the item definition to be added.

summary.span: 將項目定義加入至這個專案。

span.span: Adds an item definition to this project.

returns.span: 傳回已加入的項目定義。

span.span: Returns the added item definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立項目，然後加入沒有條件屬性的項目群組，和至少一個項目相同的項目類型。Creates an item, then adds it to an item group with no Condition attribute and at least one item of same item type. 如果找到這類的項目群組，就會建立新的項目群組和新增項目。If no such item group is found, creates a new item group and adds the item to it. 包含值會依據排序項目。Items are ordered by Include values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemDefinitionGroupElement AddItemDefinitionGroup() cil managed

summary.span: 將項目定義群組加入至這個專案。

span.span: Adds an item definition group to this project.

returns.span: 傳回已加入的項目定義群組。

span.span: Returns the added item definition group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立並將項目定義群組的最後一個現有的項目定義群組之後，如果有的話。Creates and adds an item definition group after the last existing item definition group, if any. 否則，如果有的話，請最後一個現有的屬性群組之後, 建立的項目定義群組。Otherwise, creates an item definition group after the last existing property group, if any. 如果屬性群組不存在，會建立新的項目定義群組，在專案結尾處。If no property group exists, creates a new item definition group at the end of the project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemGroupElement AddItemGroup() cil managed

summary.span: 建立項目群組並加入至這個專案。

span.span: Creates and adds an item group to this project.

returns.span: 傳回已加入的項目群組。

span.span: Returns the added item group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立並將項目群組最後一個現有的項目群組之後，如果有的話。Creates and adds an item group after the last existing item group, if any. 否則，如果有的話，請最後一個現有的屬性群組之後, 建立的項目群組。Otherwise, creates an item group after the last existing property group, if any. 如果屬性群組不存在，會建立新的項目群組，在專案結尾處。If no property group exists, creates a new item group at the end of the project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectPropertyElement AddProperty(string name, string value) cil managed
Public Function AddProperty (name As String, value As String) As ProjectPropertyElement

param.name: name
param.span: 要更新或加入之屬性的名稱。

span.span: The name of the property to be updated or added.

param.name: value
param.span: 要更新或加入之屬性的值。

span.span: The value of the property to be updated or added.

summary.span: 更新屬性或將它加入至這個專案。

span.span: Updates or adds a property to this project.

returns.span: 傳回已更新或已加入的屬性。

span.span: Returns the updated or added property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更新現有的最後一個屬性具有指定`name`本身或包含它的屬性群組上具有沒有條件屬性。Updates the last existing property with the specified `name` that has no Condition attribute on itself or on the property group that contains it. 否則，建立屬性，並將它加入至第一個沒有條件屬性的屬性群組。Otherwise, creates a property and adds it to the first property group that has no Condition attribute. 如果沒有這類屬性群組，最後一個現有的屬性群組之後, 會建立屬性群組，如果有的話，將屬性加入至它。If no such property group exists, creates a property group after the last existing property group, if any, and adds the property to it . 否則，會建立再將屬性群組加入至專案，開始並將屬性加入它。Otherwise, creates and adds a property group to the start of the project, and adds the property to it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectPropertyGroupElement AddPropertyGroup() cil managed

summary.span: 將新屬性群組加入至這個專案。

span.span: Adds a new property group to this project.

returns.span: 傳回已加入的屬性群組。

span.span: Returns the added property group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立屬性群組，並將它加入最後一個現有的屬性群組之後，如果有的話。Creates a property group and adds it after the last existing property group, if any. 否則，屬性將群組加入至專案開始。Otherwise, adds the property group to the start of the project.

Returns the added target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 挑選位置的便利方法為基礎的啟發學習法： 在專案結尾處建立目標。Convenience method that picks a location based on a heuristic: Creates a target at the end of the project.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultTargets { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 DefaultTargets 屬性的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the DefaultTargets attribute.

value.span: 傳回 DefaultTargets 屬性的值。

span.span: Returns the value of the DefaultTargets attribute.

value.span: 如果屬性不存在，則會傳回空字串。

span.span: Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要設定的值為空字串或 null，請移除 DefaultTargets 屬性。Removes the DefaultTargets attribute if the value to set is an empty string or null.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DefaultTargetsLocation As ElementLocation

summary.span: DefaultTargets 屬性在這個項目上的位置 (如果有的話)。

span.span: Location of the DefaultTargets attribute on this element, if any.

value.span: 傳回 DefaultTargets 屬性位置。

span.span: Returns the DefaultTargets attribute location.

value.span: 如果沒有這種屬性，則會傳回 null。

span.span: If there is no such attribute, returns null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未儲存檔案，或自從上次儲存之後已編輯檔案，可能不正確。May not be correct if file is not saved, or file has been edited since it was last saved.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DirectoryPath As String
public: property System::String ^ DirectoryPath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得專案檔案的目錄路徑。

span.span: Gets the directory path to the project file.

value.span: 傳回目錄路徑 (絕不會是 Null)。

span.span: Returns the directory path, which is never null.

value.span: 如果不是從磁碟載入專案，則會傳回載入專案時的現行目錄。

span.span: If the project is not loaded from disk, returns the current-directory at the time the project was loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是為了評估相對路徑。This method is required for evaluating relative paths.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Encoding As Encoding
public: property System::Text::Encoding ^ Encoding { System::Text::Encoding ^ get(); };

summary.span: 指定要用於儲存專案檔案的字元編碼。

span.span: Specifies the character encoding that the project file is to be saved in.

value.span: 傳回要用於儲存專案檔案的字元編碼。

span.span: Returns the character encoding that the project file is to be saved in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回指定的專案檔中的 Xml 宣告的編碼方式。Returns the encoding given by the Xml declaration in the project file. 如果未指定編碼時，預設為 utf-8。If no encoding is specified, this defaults to UTF 8.

value.span: 傳回專案檔案的完整路徑。

span.span: Returns the full path to the project file.

value.span: 如果不是從磁碟載入專案，則會傳回 Null。

span.span: If the project is not loaded from disk, returns null.

span.span: Determines whether the project has been modified since it was last loaded or saved.

span.span: Returns true if the project has been modified; false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以用來判斷是否有已檔案在磁碟上變更由 MSBuild 處理序以外的處理序。This property can be used to determine whether a file has been changed on disk by a process other than the MSBuild process.

span.span: Returns all the child property groups present in this project, starting with the last group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不包含所選擇的項目包含任何項目群組。Does not include any item groups contained by Choose elements.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RawXml As String
public: property System::String ^ RawXml { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得表示此專案的 XML 內容。

span.span: Gets the XML content that represents this project.

value.span: 傳回以字串表示此專案的 XML 內容。

span.span: Returns the XML content that represents this project as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不會標記為未修改的內容。Does not mark the content as unmodified. MSBuild 物件模型會提供其他方法可存取的 XML 內容。The MSBuild object model provides no other way to access the XML content.

summary.span: 將已經過修改的專案儲存至檔案系統。

span.span: Saves the project, if modified, to the file system.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save() cil managed

summary.span: 將已經過修改的專案儲存至檔案系統。

span.span: Saves the project, if modified, to the file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用編碼方式編碼屬性傳回的字元。Uses the character Encoding returned by the Encoding property. 將標示為未修改專案。Marks the project as unmodified.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.IO.TextWriter writer) cil managed

param.name: writer
param.span: 要在其中寫入專案的文字寫入器。

span.span: The text writer to write the project to.

summary.span: 不論專案是否已經過修改，請將專案儲存至指定的文字寫入器。

span.span: Saves the project to the specified text writer, whether modified or not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字元編碼方式的 TextWriter。Uses the character encoding of the TextWriter. 將標示為未修改專案。Marks the project as unmodified.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(string path) cil managed

param.name: path
param.span: 專案在儲存區中的檔案路徑。

summary.span: 如果專案已經過修改或者是儲存區的檔案路徑已變更，則儲存專案。

span.span: Saves the project, if modified or if the file path to storage has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將標示為未修改專案。Marks the project as unmodified.

span.span: Saves the project, if modified, using the specified character encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將標示為未修改專案。Marks the project as unmodified.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TimeLastChanged As DateTime
public: property DateTime TimeLastChanged { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得上次修改這個專案的時間。

span.span: Gets the time that this project was last modified.

value.span: 傳回上次修改這個專案的時間。

span.span: Returns the time that this project was last modified.

value.span: 如果專案自從建立或載入之後就沒有被修改過，則會傳回 Null。

span.span: Returns null if the project hasn't been modified since being created or loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolsVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 ToolsVersion 屬性的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the ToolsVersion attribute.

value.span: 傳回 ToolsVersion 屬性值。

span.span: Returns the ToolsVersion attribute value.

value.span: 如果屬性不存在，則會傳回空字串。

span.span: Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要設定的值為空字串或 null，請移除 ToolsVersion 屬性。Removes the ToolsVersion attribute if the value to set is an empty string or null.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ToolsVersionLocation As ElementLocation

summary.span: 這個項目上 ToolsVersion 屬性的位置 (如果有的話)。

span.span: The location of the ToolsVersion attribute on this element, if any.

value.span: 傳回 ToolsVersion 屬性位置。

span.span: Returns the ToolsVersion attribute location.

value.span: 如果沒有這種屬性，則會傳回 null。

span.span: If there is no such attribute, returns null.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TreatAsLocalProperty { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 TreatAsLocalProperty 屬性的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the TreatAsLocalProperty attribute.

value.span: 傳回 TreatAsLocalProperty 屬性值。

span.span: Returns the TreatAsLocalProperty attribute value.

value.span: 如果屬性不存在，則會傳回空字串。

span.span: Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要設定的值為空字串或 null，請移除 TreatAsLocalProperty 的屬性。Removes the TreatAsLocalProperty attribute if the value to set is an empty string or null. 如需有關`TreatAsLocalProperty`屬性，請參閱[專案項目 (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653)和[如何： 建置相同原始程式檔使用不同的選項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d14f1212-ddd9-434f-b138-f840011b0fb2)。For more information about the `TreatAsLocalProperty` attribute, see [Project Element (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653) and [How to: Build the Same Source Files with Different Options](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d14f1212-ddd9-434f-b138-f840011b0fb2).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TreatAsLocalPropertyLocation As ElementLocation

summary.span: 這個項目上 TreatAsLocalProperty 屬性的位置 (如果有的話)。

span.span: The location of the TreatAsLocalProperty attribute on this element, if any.

value.span: 傳回 TreatAsLocalProperty 屬性位置。

span.span: Returns the TreatAsLocalProperty attribute location.

value.span: 如果沒有這種屬性，則會傳回 null。

span.span: If there is no such attribute, returns null.

summary.span: 取得全域專案集合中已從指定檔案路徑載入至記憶體中的專案根項目。

span.span: Gets the project root in the global project collection that was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

summary.span: 如果此項目目前不在記憶體中，則為 null。

span.span: or null if it is not currently in memory.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectRootElement TryOpen(string path) cil managed
Public Shared Function TryOpen (path As String) As ProjectRootElement

param.name: path
param.span: ProjectRootElement 的路徑 (不可以是 Null)。

span.span: The path of the ProjectRootElement, cannot be null.

summary.span: 取得全域專案集合中已從指定檔案路徑載入至記憶體中的專案根項目。

span.span: Gets the project root in the global project collection that was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

summary.span: 如果此項目目前不在記憶體中，則為 null。

span.span: or null if it is not currently in memory.
Returns the project root.

returns.span: 如果沒有任何專案是從指定的檔案路徑載入至記憶體中，則會傳回 Null。

span.span: Returns null if no project was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它有可能 ProjectRootElements 讀取到記憶體並捨棄由於記憶體不足的壓力。It is possible for ProjectRootElements to be brought into memory and discarded due to memory pressure. 如果 TryOpen 傳回 null 則不表示，專案根目錄從未已載入，只有它目前不在記憶體中。If TryOpen returns null it does not indicate that the project root has never been loaded, only that it is not currently in memory.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectRootElement TryOpen(string path, class Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.ProjectCollection projectCollection) cil managed

param.name: path
param.span: ProjectRootElement 的路徑 (不可以是 Null)。

span.span: The path of the ProjectRootElement, cannot be null.

param.name: projectCollection
param.span: 用於搜尋專案根項目的專案集合。

span.span: The project collection to search for the project root.

summary.span: 取得指定專案集合中已從指定檔案路徑載入至記憶體中的專案根項目。

span.span: Gets the project root in the specified project collection that was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

summary.span: 如果此項目目前不在記憶體中，則為 null。

span.span: or null if it is not currently in memory.
Returns the project root.

returns.span: 如果沒有任何專案是從指定的檔案路徑載入至記憶體中，則會傳回 Null。

span.span: Returns null if no project was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它有可能 ProjectRootElements 讀取到記憶體並捨棄由於記憶體不足的壓力。It is possible for ProjectRootElements to be brought into memory and discarded due to memory pressure. 如果 TryOpen 傳回 null 則不表示，專案根目錄從未已載入，只有它目前不在記憶體中。If TryOpen returns null it does not indicate that the project root has never been loaded, only that it is not currently in memory.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UsingTasks As ICollection(Of ProjectUsingTaskElement)

summary.span: 取得這個專案中的所有子 [UsingTask 項目 (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43)。

span.span: Gets all child [UsingTask Element (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43) in this project.

value.span: 傳回這個專案中的所有子 UsingTask 項目。

span.span: Returns all child UsingTask elements in this project.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個物件的版本號碼。

span.span: Gets the version number of this object.

value.span: 傳回這個物件的版本號碼。

span.span: Returns the version number of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比較這個版本數字，以判斷是否已變更專案的 XML 內容，即使專案儲存在變更後儲存的版本號碼。Compare this version number to a stored version number to determine whether the project XML content has changed, even if the project is saved after the change. 編輯可能會一次以上，遞增版本號碼，因此應該只儲存值比較版本。An edit may increment the version number more than once, so Version should only be compared to a stored value.
